items.sentence: Tom and Mary ate popcorn while watching the movie.
Tom asked Mary to help him reformat the hard disk.
Tom asked me if I had a black tie he could borrow.
Tom asked me if I wanted to go to Boston with him.
Tom began living by himself at the age of sixteen.
Tom worked as a teacher in Boston for a few years.
Tom would go to Boston with us if he had the time.
Tom wrote a book while he was living in Australia.
Tom wrote his name on the dust-covered windshield.
I\'ve already forgotten Tom\'s girlfriend\'s name.
